data.title: Dialysis Clinic, Inc. on LinkedIn: The care of the patient is our reason for existence.
data.meta_description: Looking to start your career in the healthcare field? DCI is the perfect place to begin. Our culture promotes work-life balance, education and opportunities‚Ä¶
data.text:
Looking for your next career move? Dialysis Clinic, Inc., is hiring across the U.S. for a variety of roles. From new graduates, experienced nurses, social workers and dietitians, there‚Äôs a place for you here. At DCI, we‚Äôre more than just another job in healthcare. We‚Äôre the nation‚Äôs largest nonprofit dialysis provider, and the care of the patient is our reason for existence. Come and see the DCI difference for yourself! DCI recruitment video: https://lnkd.in/e6x8CFck Job opportunities: https://dciinc.jobs

DCI serves approximately 14,000 patients daily across 28 states and we‚Äôre excited to highlight some of them just as we spotlight our dedicated employees. Meet Gary, a Mexico, Mo., patient since 2020. Gary is passionate about restoring old cars, a hobby that began with his father in the 1970s. He‚Äôs also a sports fan, cheering on the Kansas City Chiefs and the St. Louis Cardinals. When he‚Äôs not working on classic cars, Gary, a self-proclaimed ‚Äúsnowbird,‚Äù can be found avoiding the Missouri winters in sunny Florida. Check out these photos of Gary and clinic employees the day he drove his 1930 Chevrolet Business Coop to a recent treatment!

Bill, a patient dialyzing at our East Liverpool, Ohio, clinic since 2016, turned 90 recently, and employees couldn‚Äôt let the day pass without commemorating his milestone birthday! Known for his sense of humor, Bill can always be found cracking jokes and carrying a stash of two-dollar bills everywhere he goes. ‚ÄúHe always brings a smile to everyone‚Äôs face around the clinic,‚Äù said East Liverpool Nurse Jillian. Employees wanted to return Bill‚Äôs infectious energy, honoring his special day with balloons and a birthday flag. Happy 90th Birthday, Bill!

It‚Äôs finally #FeedbackFriday, and we‚Äôre excited to share another five-star review! Kudos to our Philadelphia Falls clinic in Philadelphia, Pa., whose compassionate employees make patients and family members feel comfortable. Way to go, DCI Philadelphia Falls! We‚Äôd love to hear from you too! Leave your clinic a Google or Facebook review and you may find it featured on an upcoming #FeedbackFriday!

The 2024 Tennessee Kidney Foundation Golf Invitational is less than two weeks away! The annual tournament raising funds for TKF‚Äôs statewide programs supporting kidney patients will be held at the Governor‚Äôs Club in Brentwood, Tenn., on Monday, Aug. 19. DCI is proud to sponsor the Golf Invitational again this year, as we share a similar passion for the work they champion. We are grateful for the time and talents DCI leaders share serving on the TKF board as well. Interested in the event? Visit https://lnkd.in/gVbMWMHF to learn more!

Tropical Storm Debby is affecting DCI operations in coastal South Carolina. Please see below for schedule updates. Please contact your clinic directly for the most up-to-date information. Visit https://lnkd.in/gjA5E8ft for further information and resources. Wednesday, Aug. 7 CLOSURES DCI James Island, Charleston, S.C. Thursday, Aug. 8 SCHEDULE/OPERATIONAL CHANGES DCI James Island, Charleston, S.C. ‚Äì Running extra dialysis shifts to accommodate all patients.

As a new school year begins, we send our well wishes for a great year! We hope it‚Äôs filled with fun, friends and learning exciting new things. ‚úèÔ∏èüìö

It‚Äôs #FeedbackFriday, our favorite day of the week where we share your DCI experiences! Today we‚Äôre highlighting our Glens Falls, N.Y., clinic and its friendly and helpful employees who make everyone feel welcome, including visiting patients. Great work, DCI Glens Falls! We‚Äôd love to hear from you too! Leave us a review on Facebook, Google or Glassdoor today!

We‚Äôre looking for a Registered Nurse to join our team at our pediatric dialysis unit in Austin, Texas! If you‚Äôre interested in taking your career in a new direction, this is a great opportunity for you. No dialysis experience is necessary, and new nurse graduates are encouraged to apply! Enjoy flexible schedules, paid training, opportunities for education reimbursement and more, at DCI, a family-operated dialysis provider putting patients first for more than fifty years. Apply/learn more: https://loom.ly/IKyPaPo
